intro: v-date-picker is a fully featured date selection component that lets users select a date, or range of dates.

allowed.heading: Allowed dates
allowed.intro: You can specify allowed dates using arrays, objects, and functions.

colors.heading: Colors
colors.intro: Date picker colors can be set using the color and header-color props. If header-color prop is not provided header will use the color prop value.

multiple.heading: Multiple
multiple.intro: Date picker can now select multiple dates with the multiple prop. If using multiple then date picker expects its model to be an array.

picker.heading: Picker date
picker.intro: You can watch the picker-date which is the displayed month/year (depending on the picker type and active view) to perform some action when it changes. This uses the .sync modifier.

range.heading: Range
range.intro: Date picker can select date range with the range prop. When using range prop date picker expects its model to be an array of length 2 or empty.

buttons.heading: Date buttons
buttons.intro: Handle events such as @click, @dblclick, @mouseenter, and more when interacting with date, month, and year buttons.
